vernac_cmds: Require Import ZArith_base ZArithRing Zcomplements Zdiv Znumtheory.
Lemma Zpower_pos_1_r x : Z.pow_pos x 1 = x.
Lemma Zpower_pos_pos x p : 0 < x -> 0 < Z.pow_pos x p.
Theorem Zpower_le_monotone a b c : 0 < a -> 0 <= b <= c -> a^b <= a^c.
Theorem Zpower_lt_monotone a b c : 1 < a -> 0 <= b < c -> a^b < a^c.
Theorem Zpower_gt_1 x y : 1 < x -> 0 < y -> 1 < x^y.
Theorem Zmult_power p q r : 0 <= r -> (p*q)^r = p^r * q^r.
Theorem Zpower_le_monotone3 a b c : 0 <= c -> 0 <= a <= b -> a^c <= b^c.
Lemma Zpower_le_monotone_inv a b c : 1 < a -> 0 < b -> a^b <= a^c -> b <= c.
Lemma Zpower2_Psize n p : Zpos p < 2^(Z.of_nat n) <-> (Pos.size_nat p <= n)%nat.
Theorem Zpower_mod p q n : 0 < n -> (p^q) mod n = ((p mod n)^q) mod n.
rewrite Z.mul_mod, Rec, <- Z.mul_mod; auto with zarith.

Fixpoint Zpow_mod_pos (a: Z)(m: positive)(n : Z) : Z := match m with | xH => a mod n | xO m' => let z := Zpow_mod_pos a m' n in match z with | 0 => 0 | _ => (z * z) mod n end | xI m' => let z := Zpow_mod_pos a m' n in match z with | 0 => 0 | _ => (z * z * a) mod n end end.
Definition Zpow_mod a m n := match m with | 0 => 1 mod n | Zpos p => Zpow_mod_pos a p n | Zneg p => 0 end.
Theorem Zpow_mod_pos_correct a m n : n <> 0 -> Zpow_mod_pos a m n = (Z.pow_pos a m) mod n.
rewrite Z.mul_mod, (Z.mul_mod (Z.pow_pos a m)) by trivial.
Theorem Zpow_mod_correct a m n : n <> 0 -> Zpow_mod a m n = (a ^ m) mod n.
Lemma Zpower_divide p q : 0 < q -> (p | p ^ q).
rewrite Z.mul_comm, <- Z.pow_succ_r; f_equal; auto with zarith.
Theorem rel_prime_Zpower_r i p q : 0 <= i -> rel_prime p q -> rel_prime p (q^i).
intros Hi Hpq; pattern i; apply natlike_ind; auto with zarith.
intros i Hi Rec; rewrite Z.pow_succ_r; auto.
Theorem rel_prime_Zpower i j p q : 0 <= i -> 0 <= j -> rel_prime p q -> rel_prime (p^i) (q^j).
Theorem prime_power_prime p q n : 0 <= n -> prime p -> prime q -> (p | q^n) -> p = q.
intros Hn Hp Hq; pattern n; apply natlike_ind; auto; clear n Hn.
assert (p<=1) by (apply Z.divide_pos_le; auto with zarith).
Theorem Zdivide_power_2 x p n : 0 <= n -> 0 <= x -> prime p -> (x | p^n) -> exists m, x = p^m.
intros Hn Hx; revert p n Hn.
clear x Hx; intros x IH Hx p n Hn Hp H.
apply Z.le_succ_l in Hx; simpl in Hx.
exists 1; rewrite Z.pow_1_r; apply prime_power_prime with n; auto.
assert (Hq1 : 0 < q1) by (apply Z.mul_lt_mono_pos_r with p1; auto with zarith).
destruct (IH p1) with p n as (r1,Hr1); auto with zarith.
destruct (IH q1) with p n as (r2,Hr2); auto with zarith.
generalize Hq1; case r2; now auto with zarith.
generalize Hp1; case r1; now auto with zarith.
exists n; destruct H; rewrite Z.mul_0_r in H; auto.

command: rewrite Z.mul_mod, Rec, <- Z.mul_mod; auto with zarith.
rewrite Z.mul_mod, (Z.mul_mod (Z.pow_pos a m)) by trivial.
rewrite Z.mul_comm, <- Z.pow_succ_r; f_equal; auto with zarith.
intros Hi Hpq; pattern i; apply natlike_ind; auto with zarith.
intros i Hi Rec; rewrite Z.pow_succ_r; auto.
intros Hn Hp Hq; pattern n; apply natlike_ind; auto; clear n Hn.
assert (p<=1) by (apply Z.divide_pos_le; auto with zarith).
intros Hn Hx; revert p n Hn.
clear x Hx; intros x IH Hx p n Hn Hp H.
apply Z.le_succ_l in Hx; simpl in Hx.
exists 1; rewrite Z.pow_1_r; apply prime_power_prime with n; auto.
assert (Hq1 : 0 < q1) by (apply Z.mul_lt_mono_pos_r with p1; auto with zarith).
destruct (IH p1) with p n as (r1,Hr1); auto with zarith.
destruct (IH q1) with p n as (r2,Hr2); auto with zarith.
generalize Hq1; case r2; now auto with zarith.
generalize Hp1; case r1; now auto with zarith.
exists n; destruct H; rewrite Z.mul_0_r in H; auto.
